Class.name: Report.FINAPPaymentInvoice
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.Company as FINAPPaymentLine_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.Company as FINAPPaymentInvoice_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.LineNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.PaymentNumber as InvPaymentNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.PaymentLineNumber as InvPaymentLineNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.InvoiceNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.PayAmountBASE,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.Notes,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.InvoiceDate,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.DueDate,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.SupplierNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.Pay,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice.DiscountBASE,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.TotalDisc from SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentInvoice where (FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber=FINAPPaymentInvoice.PaymentNumber) AND (FINAPPaymentLine.LineNumber=FINAPPaymentInvoice.PaymentLineNumber)
